summary: The old heroes leave their homes to protect Skyrim: Old witches and heros of past wars are heading to battle. Are you prepared to take the role of an elder?
descriptionHtml:
The mod basically lets yo play as an elder through de lands of Skyrim, and grants you the chance of being an old witch, a wise sorcerer, or even an old warrior looking to restore his past glory.

The Elders have 25% cold resistance as well as 25% disease resistance. They also have a +15 bonus on speech, +10 bonus on destruction, +5 bonus on enchanting and +5 bonus on alteration. (They are old, and they make better mages than warriors)

While most races can initially carry a weight of 300, elders can only carry 200

Known bugs:

In the first person view the arms my disappear (while the hands won\'t).
author: Hadok
